Documentation: The DM deveopers guide provides information for staff using development resources at NCSA.

Name: [LDF-Managed-Data] A Set of Uniform Data Managemetn Requirements (Requirement)
Documentation: This element represents a set of requirements that apply to all LDF-Managed Data.

Name: [LDF-Managed-Data] Administraiton consistent with DR and Continutity Plan(Requirement)
Documentation: The management plan  for this data is consitent with the  Distaster Recovery and and Continuity Plan for Data.

Name: [LDF-Managed-Data] Capacity Forecast Exists (Requirement)
Documentation: There is a forecast for the amounts of a kind of  data anticiapted in the future, allowing for capacity planning.

Name: [LDF-Managed-Data] LIfecycle Consistent with Data Management Policy(Requirement)
Documentation: THere si a defined lifecyle in place to manage the data, consistent with its information classification.

Name: [ldf] A Set of Uniform Service Element Requirements (Requirement)
Documentation: The Uniform Servince Element Requirements apply to all LDF offered Services

Name: [ldf] Adequate Comfort Display (Requirement)
Documentation: Comfort displays show current salient aspects of a service at a high level. A comfort display provides  at-a-glace understanding of the level of functioning of a service, and information potentialy useful for trouble ticketing. The comfort display may be monitored by TMG to detect downtime

Name: [ldf] Consistent with Availablity Management Report
Documentation: The display captures the long term information about the availablity of a service, with an attempt to discriminate between scheduled and unscheduled outages. The display provides a coherent viewpoint for the availability of all LDF services.

Name: [ldf] Consistent with Capacity Managment Display (Requirement)
Documentation: The display cpatures capacity management at a glance. The goal of the display is to capture demand on the service and also the service level delivered, with a focus on long term trends. The display provides a coherent viewpoint for the availability of all LDF services

Name: [ldf] Consistent with Mou With CC-IN2P3 (Requirement)
Documentation: the CC-IN2P3 MoU  governs relationships wiht the LDF at a high level.

Name: [ldf] Consistent with MoU With North South WAN Providers (Requirement)
Documentation: The Mous are betweenteh project and the ensempble of providers related to network providers

Name: [ldf] Consistent with Service Status Page (Requirement)
Documentation: THe service Status page show planng dowtime, actual Known status of the running services
